availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Edward C. Watson (Logan Co, Ky, farmer and prov govt)

body.p: Logan County, Kentucky, farmer and provisional government convention member. Virginia native. Married to Ellen Watson. Father of John W. Watson, Mildred Watson, Alice Celeste Watson, Ophelia E. Watson, Eugene Watson. Farmer in Logan County, Kentucky, in 1850. Owned eight enslaved persons in Logan County in 1850. Farmer in Logan County in 1860. Member of the convention of the provisional government held at Russellville in November 1861.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Logan County, District 1, p. 55A.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Logan County, District 1.

KYR-0004-033-0001.
